questions.question: Which of the following statements is true about combining passive and active attacks?

answers.a: Passive attacks are less dangerous than active attacks
answers.b: Active attacks are less detectable than passive attacks.
answers.c: Combining passive and active attacks can increase the success rate of an attack.
answers.d: Combining passive and active attacks can only be done by expert hackers.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes combining active and passive attacks in an ongoing computer in a network?
Which of the following is a type of replay attack?
